products.title: Linear Stem Silver  Roller Blind
products.description: This linear stem silver roller blind is classic orla kiely in a contemporary setting. That iconic stem pattern is well-known and much-loved while the grey and white palette offers a contemporary twist. You can easily use this blind in any room in the home, with the light filterin this linear stem silver roller blind is classic orla kiely in a contemporary setting.

products.title: Linear Stem Cool Grey Roller Blind
products.description: Famed for her love of 70s design and retro design sensibilities, orla kiely has produced here something deliciously contemporary.
